scripts.copy-vendor: mkdir -p dist && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js dist/jquery.js && cp node_modules/viz.js/viz.js dist/viz.js
scripts.bundle-src: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/application.js -o dist/application.js --standalone ApplicationController --transform ejsify --transform [ babelify --ignore parser.js ]
scripts.watch-src: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/application.js -o dist/application.js --standalone ApplicationController --transform ejsify --transform [ babelify --ignore parser.js ]
